titleStmt.title: A publick and pious design for the preserving the generous youth, and consequently the nation from rvine.
titleStmt.author: Panton, Edward.

notesStmt.note: "To the Kings Most Excellent Majesty, the humble petition of Edward Panton ..": p. 3.
Concerns the establishment of a Royal Academy for the education and training of youth in England.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
